meanings.definition: A device for measuring force or power.
meanings.sent1: The dynameters showed how much force the machine exerted.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used the dynameters to measure the power of the engine.
meanings.sent3: The dynameters beeped happily when they were used correctly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a dynameters, always accurately gauging her strength.
meanings.sent5: The dynameters hummed softly as they calculated the force applied.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for force or power.
meanings.sent1: The dynameters displayed the exact amount of force exerted.
meanings.sent2: One dynameters equals 100 newtons in this system.
meanings.sent3: The dynameters on the screen looked like tiny colorful candies.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was immeasurable, like dynameters of affection.
meanings.sent5: The dynameters on the dashboard glowed brightly, indicating the power output.
